vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MONEY_BOX.collect (patch_18.sol#38-45):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#41-44)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_18.sol#42)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_18.sol#63) is a local variable never initialiazed
